title: Problem logging in

review:
I tapped an in app purchase that said it cost 0.99$ on the app. While purchasing, it showed 79‚Çπ which was the correct conversion rate. After approving the payment, to my utter shock, 1500‚Çπ got debited from my bank account which did not even reflect in the form of purchase that I had meant to pay for in the app.
In grave times like these where every penny matters, economies are collapsing, the world is in a crisis, I am enraged by this loss that I have incurred due to the fraudulent nature of this app. Beware of these cheaters.
Go read an actual book rather than wasting money on this. All their ‚Äúinteractive‚Äù books are available in pdf/ebook versions anyway.
title: Fraud app

review:
This game is so amazing! I just really love it! There are so many stories with choices to choose from and so many books that others have written! Being friends, chatting and sending bubbles - wow! ü§©
I just really like the fact that we can write and own stories and participate in the challenges! 
I really recommend you guys to download it! 
So happy I got to know about this game!
